column1: French: Votre passeport doit être valide pendant au moins six mois au-delà de vos dates de voyage. column3: Other possibilities based on the biorythm include drinking a lot of liquids before going to bed (especially water or tea, which are reputed to be diuretics), which forces you to wake up to urinate.

column2: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
column3: The center of Tibetan meditation is the yoga of deity. It is through the visualization of different deities that the energy channels are cleansed, the chakras activated, and the state of awakening created.

column1: French: "L'ambassade des États-Unis à Nairobi au Kenya, a lancé une mise en garde, contre des ""extrémistes en provenance de Somalie"" qui projetteraient des attentats- suicides à la bombe sur les sols kényan et éthiopien." = English: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. ### French: Il n'y a pas vraiment de saisons « pluvieuses » et « sèches » : les précipitations sont à peu près constantes tout au long de l'année. = English:
column2: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
column3: There are no really "wet" and "dry" seasons: the rainfall is roughly constant throughout the year.

column1: French: Elle peut être personnalisée afin d'en faciliter la lecture, et l'on peut y mettre autant ou aussi peu de couleur que l'on souhaite. = English: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired. ### French: Après sept jours de défaites électorales aux élections de mi-mandat, Bush a fait part de son projet d'élargir le commerce en Asie. = English:
column2: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
column3: After seven days of electoral defeats in the midterm elections, Bush announced his plan to expand trade in Asia.

column1: French: Pour quelques pièces de monnaie, des enfants vous raconteront l’histoire. = English: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story. ### French: Malheureusement, l'apparition de nouveaux modes de rédaction a relégué le stylo à un statut plus confidentiel et à des utilisations plus rares. = English:
column2: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.
column3: Unfortunately, the appearance of new writing modes relegated the pen to a more confidential status and to more rare uses.

column1: French: Les scientifiques ont découvert des reliefs parsemés sur toute la surface de la lune, appelés escarpements lobés, qui résulteraient apparemment du fait que la lune rétrécisse progressivement. = English: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. ### French: Les opinions d'Aristote sur toutes les questions scientifiques, y compris la psychologie, ont été acceptées. = English:
column2: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
column3: Aristotle's opinions on all scientific questions, including psychology, were accepted.

column1: French: Stardust établira un nouveau record historique pour être le vaisseau spatial le plus rapide à revenir sur Terre, battant le précédent record établi en mai 1969 lors du retour du module de commande d'Apollo X. = English: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. ### French: Les théories du contenu sont centrées sur la recherche de ce qui fait que les gens se sentent bien ou qu'ils sont attirés. = English:
column2: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.
column3: Theories of content are centered on the search for what makes people feel good or attracted.

column1: French: Le temple d'Artémis à Ephèse a été détruit le 21 juillet 356 avant J.-C. lors d'un incendie criminel commis par Herostratus. = English: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus. ### French: Nous fabriquons nos maisons et nos vêtements à base de plantes. La plupart des aliments que nous mangeons sont des plantes. Sans les plantes, les animaux ne survivraient pas. = English:
column2: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
column3: We make our houses and clothes from plants. Most of the food we eat is plant-based. Without plants, animals would not survive.

column1: French: Le cyclone Felicia, après avoir atteint le niveau 4 sur l'échelle de Saffir-Simpson, s'est transformé en dépression tropicale avant de se dissiper mardi. = English: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. ### French: Le dernier match du championnat aura lieu à l’Ellis Park de Johannesburg la semaine prochaine, lorsque les Springboks affronteront l’Australie. = English:
column2: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
column3: The last match of the championship will be held at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks will face Australia.

column1: French: Les variantes du français pratiquées en Belgique et en Suisse diffèrent légèrement du français parlé en France, bien qu'elles soient suffisamment similaires pour être mutuellement intelligibles. = English: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. ### French: L'une des méthodes les plus courantes utilisées pour illustrer l'importance de la socialisation est de s'inspirer des quelques cas malheureux d'enfants qui, par négligence, malheur ou abus volontaire, n'ont pas été socialisés par des adultes pendant leur enfance. = English:
column2: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
column3: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw on the few unfortunate cases of children who, through neglect, misfortune or deliberate abuse, have not been socialized by adults during their childhood.

column1: French: La semaine passée, Naked News a annoncé son intention d'augmenter sérieusement le nombre d'heures dédiées au journal en langue internationale, avec trois nouveaux programmes à la clé. = English: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. ### French: L’argent pourrait être reversé dans la construction de maisons résistantes aux inondations, dans une meilleure gestion de l’eau et dans la diversification des cultures. = English:
column2: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
column3: The money could be used to build flood-resistant houses, to improve water management and to diversify crops.

column1: French: Néanmoins, il existe de nombreuses façons de boire le café dans le monde entier qui valent la peine d'être expérimentées. = English: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing. ### French: L'argent peut être échangé à la seule banque des îles située à Stanley, en face du magasin FIC West. = English:
column2: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store.
column3: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands, located in Stanley, opposite the FIC West store.

column1: French: En début de journée les vents soufflaient à environ 83 km/h, et ils devraient continuer à faiblir. = English: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening. ### French: Ne défigurez pas le site en marquant ou en grattant des graffitis sur les structures. = English:
column2: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
column3: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti on the structures.
